definition: arrow/dart/straight/to vow/to swear/old variant of 屎[shi3]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
lit. target of a multitude of arrows (idiom); the butt of public criticism/attacked on all sides
to take an oath to do sth/to pledge/to vow
to shoot without aim (idiom); fig. to speak without thinking/firing blindly/to shoot in the air/a shot in the dark
to hit the target with a single shot/to say something spot on (idiom)

sentences.english: The problem of transient two-phase flow is solved by split flux vector method in this pader.
sentences.chinese: 本文用矢通量分裂法求解了瞬态两相流问题。

sentences.english: No matter how good things are lost one day.
sentences.chinese: 再好旳东西都有矢去旳一兲。

sentences.english: The director deformation caused by a charged colloidal particle suspended in a nematic liquid crystal is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究悬浮在向列相液晶中带电胶粘引起的指向矢形变。

sentences.english: Then let mine arm fall from my shoulder blade, and mine arm be broken from the bone.
sentences.chinese: 情愿我的肩头从缺盆骨脱落，我的膀臂从羊矢骨折断。

sentences.english: You are the bows from which your chidren as living arrows are sent forth.
sentences.chinese: 你们是弓，你们的孩子是从弦上发出去的生命之剑矢。

sentences.english: This is the beginning of the west physiology transmitting to China.
sentences.chinese: 这是西方生理学传入中国之嚆矢。

sentences.english: The rabbits were in the supine position when the popliteal lymph nodes were scanned in the axial and sagittal planes.
sentences.chinese: 仰卧位固定兔子，轴位和矢状位扫描双侧腘窝淋巴结。

sentences.english: Director profiles of nematic liquid crystal phase gratings are simulated.
sentences.chinese: 模拟了向列相液晶相位光栅的指向矢分布。

sentences.english: So, that means the acceleration is parallel to the position.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着加速度与位矢平行。

sentences.english: From the ground at their feet, I tore my head around to see where the bolt had come from.
sentences.chinese: 我趴在地上，转著脑袋窥探著这支飞矢的来处。

sentences.english: On the sagittal non-contrasted T1-weighted images, there is no posterior pituitary bright spot noted in the sella .
sentences.chinese: 在矢状平扫T1图像上，未见鞍部垂体后部高信号。

definition: a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
8 in. length unit of Zhou dynasty
halberd/long-handled weapon with pointed tip and crescent blade/combined spear and battle-ax
a noble steed (literary)/(of a horse) untamed/(fig.) (of a person) headstrong/Taiwan pr. [ao2]
